verses.text:
Shall our cheeks be dry when we think of pain, That Jesus bore for us?
Shall our hearts be cold when we think of love, That Jesus shows to us?
Shall our lips be mute when we think of grace, That Jesus gives to us?
Shall our lives be still when we think of hope, That Jesus brings to us?
